screenshots.description: Finance menu (Payroll menu expanded) - End of Service via Payroll Table
screenshots.notes: Shows Payroll menu submenu with options: Payroll table, Adjustments, Transactions, Global salary transfers, My pay, Loans, Air tickets, Leave Salary. Note: Payload suggested 'Finance menu' but actual menu is 'Payroll'.

screenshots.description: Payroll table - End of Service via Payroll Table
screenshots.notes: Shows Payroll Table at /enterprise/payroll/list with employee data, currency tabs (AED, CNY, INR, EUR, SAR, KWD, USD, HKD), search functionality, filters, and download button. Displays July 2024 payroll cycle.
